title: Aussie olive damper bread
description: This is an Australian bread traditionally (I am led to believe), made by people in the bush on the camp fire. I love green olives, but the black variety, although normally a little more bitter, work well too.
ingredients: 450g/1lb self-raising flour, plus extra for dusting
3 sprigs rosemary, leaves only, roughly chopped
75g/3oz pitted green or black olives, roughly chopped
fruity olive oil and balsamic vinegar
